description: Fabric is sourced from a storied English mill that specializes in jacquard textiles. Woven from a blend of cotton and mulberry silk. Double-breasted silhouette. Adjustable buckled back with a custom buckle. Fully lined. Corozo buttons.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 22.75" back body length, a 14.25" shoulder, and a 42.5" chest.
Adjustable buckled back. Custom antiqued-finish buckle.
Front body: 55% cotton, 45% mulberry silk. Back body and lining: 100% cupro.
